document.full_text: former south african president nelson mandela voted in local elections monday, 10 months after the 92-year-old elder statesman last appeared in public, his foundation said.
document.title: recovering nelson mandela votes in south africa election
lines_and_colors: former south african president nelson mandela voted in local elections monday, 10 months after the 92-year-old elder statesman last appeared in public, his foundation said.
